greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If n is a prime power, p_i^e, a(n) = 0, otherwise difference (i-j) of the indices of the two largest distinct primes p_i, p_j, i > j in the prime factorization of n: a(n) = A061395(n) - A061395(A051119(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: from sympy import factorint, primefactors, primepi
def a061395(n): return 0 if n==1 else primepi(primefactors(n)[-1])
def a(n): return 0 if n==1 or len(primefactors(n))==1 else a061395(n) - a061395(a051119(n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 19 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 13 2014
